articles.headline: The Right Builds an Alternative Narrative About the Crises Around Trump
articles.snippet: On conservative media, President Trump’s supporters have used unfounded allegations, diversions and conspiracies to keep his troops behind him.
articles.abstract: On conservative media, President Trump’s supporters have used unfounded allegations, diversions and conspiracies to keep his troops behind him.
articles.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Enemies from within have launched a “deep-state” smear campaign, news organizations are acting with ulterior motives, and the worst attacks are yet to come.

articles.headline: Robert Mueller, Former F.B.I. Director, Is Named Special Counsel for Russia Investigation
articles.snippet: The decision came after a cascade of damaging developments for President Trump in the wake of his abrupt firing of the F.B.I. director, James B. Comey.
articles.abstract: The decision came after a cascade of damaging developments for President Trump in the wake of his abrupt firing of the F.B.I. director, James B. Comey.
articles.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — The Justice Department appointed Robert S. Mueller III, a former F.B.I. director, as special counsel on Wednesday to oversee the investigation into ties between President Trump’s campaign and Russian officials, dramatically raising the legal and political stakes in an affair that has threatened to engulf Mr. Trump’s four-month-old presidency.
articles.byline: By Rebecca R. Ruiz and Mark Landler

articles.headline: Trump Team Knew Flynn Was Under Investigation Before He Came to White House
articles.snippet: Michael T. Flynn told the transition team weeks before the inauguration that he was under federal investigation for secretly working as a lobbyist for Turkey.
articles.abstract: Michael T. Flynn told the transition team weeks before the inauguration that he was under federal investigation for secretly working as a lobbyist for Turkey.
articles.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Michael T. Flynn told President Trump’s transition team weeks before the inauguration that he was under federal investigation for secretly working as a paid lobbyist for Turkey during the campaign, according to two people familiar with the case.
articles.byline: By Matthew Rosenberg and Mark Mazzetti

articles.headline: Washington Is Abuzz With Surround Sound of Scandal
articles.snippet: After a succession of self-inflicted wounds, President Trump now faces the most daunting moment yet as a special counsel is appointed to investigate.
articles.abstract: After a succession of self-inflicted wounds, President Trump now faces the most daunting moment yet as a special counsel is appointed to investigate.
articles.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — On Day 118 of the Trump administration, a special counsel was appointed. The word impeachment was uttered on the floor of the House of Representatives. And the president of the United States contemplated how to go forward with the next 1,343 days.

articles.headline: Puerto Rico Faces ‘Humbling’ Scope of Its Woes in First Court Hearing
articles.snippet: Lawyers for the island’s creditors came together for their day in court, all trying to squeeze money out of a government that is broke.
articles.abstract: Lawyers for the island’s creditors came together for their day in court, all trying to squeeze money out of a government that is broke.
articles.lead_paragraph: SAN JUAN, P.R. — Puerto Rico’s first day in federal court to reduce its $123 billion in bond debt and unfunded pensions got off to a cordial enough start on Wednesday, but after a few hours, the gloves started to come off.

articles.headline: States Trim Penalties and Prison Rolls, Even as Sessions Gets Tough
articles.snippet: More than 30 states, including Texas, have moved to curb incarceration rates and find alternatives to prisons, saying they have saved money while crime has stayed low.
articles.abstract: More than 30 states, including Texas, have moved to curb incarceration rates and find alternatives to prisons, saying they have saved money while crime has stayed low.
articles.lead_paragraph: Louisiana has the nation’s highest incarceration rate. But this week, Gov. John Bel Edwards struck a deal to reduce sentences and the prison population, saving millions annually.

articles.headline: Trump, Citing ‘a Witch Hunt,’ Denies Any Collusion With Russia
articles.snippet: The president’s comments followed early-morning tweets that were sharply critical of former President Barack Obama and Hillary Clinton.
articles.abstract: The president’s comments followed early-morning tweets that were sharply critical of former President Barack Obama and Hillary Clinton.
articles.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — President Trump declared angrily on Thursday that he was the victim of a witch hunt, and all but contradicted his deputy attorney general on the firing of the F.B.I. director, in an extensive denial of any collusion between his campaign and Russia.

articles.headline: Saudi Arabia, Ignoring Trump’s Slights, Will Give Him a Royal Welcome
articles.snippet: The kingdom seeks a reset in relations after the Obama years, hoping to emphasize common goals in business, counterterrorism and confronting Iran.
articles.abstract: The kingdom seeks a reset in relations after the Obama years, hoping to emphasize common goals in business, counterterrorism and confronting Iran.
articles.lead_paragraph: BEIRUT, Lebanon — When President Trump heads to Saudi Arabia on Friday for his first trip overseas since taking office, it will be for much more than a run-of-the-mill state visit.

articles.headline: Roger Ailes, Who Built Fox News Into an Empire, Dies at 77
articles.snippet: Mr. Ailes exerted wide influence on American politics with his conservative Fox News, only to be undone by sexual harassment allegations.
articles.abstract: Mr. Ailes exerted wide influence on American politics with his conservative Fox News, only to be undone by sexual harassment allegations.
articles.lead_paragraph: Roger E. Ailes, who shaped the images that helped elect three Republican presidents and then became a dominant, often-intimidating force in American conservative politics at the helm of Fox News until he was forced out last year in a sexual harassment scandal, died on Thursday morning. He was 77.
